pkgmetadata.longdescription: Datasets to Accompany Wolfe and Schneider - Intuitive Introductory Statistics // These datasets and functions accompany Wolfe and Schneider (2017) - Intuitive Introductory Statistics (ISBN: 978-3-319-56070-0) doi:10.1007/978-3-319-56072-4. They are used in the examples throughout the text and in the end-of-chapter exercises. The datasets are meant to cover a broad range of topics in order to appeal to the diverse set of interests and backgrounds typically present in an introductory Statistics class.
